alert.note: Alert for Sheep Range; Spring Mountains (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued May 26 at 8:05PM PDT until May 27 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM PDT FRIDAY FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR SOUTHERN NEVADA AND NORTHWESTERN ARIZONA......RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM PDT FRIDAY FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR SOUTHERN NEVADA AND NORTHWESTERN ARIZONA... ...RED FLAG WARNING HAS EXPIRED FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR SOUTHERN NEVADA AND NORTHWESTERN ARIZONA......RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM PDT FRIDAY FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR SOUTHERN NEVADA AND NORTHWESTERN ARIZONA... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zones 463 and 464. * TIMING...12 PM to 8 PM PDT/MST Friday and 11 AM to 7 PM PDT/MST Saturday. * WIND...South-southwest winds 15-25 mph with gusts to 35 mph. * HUMIDITY...Afternoon humidity levels between 5 and 15 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now...or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
